divs: Sighting Detailswas out in front parking lot facing south talking to a friend on cell (was looking at building lights that I just turned on, ciurcut breaker popped off) when this orange red large light in the clouds caught my attention. It was a solid color no other lights or blinking lights, heading from the west to east. It took about 5 to 8 seconds flying over head as it past it turned black and I could then see it was circular in shape against the clouds. A few seconds later a plane flew over head it's lights blinking and smaller than object,also made noise which then made me realise that the orange red light was silent
trends: There has been one other sighting in Melrose Park
There were no other sightings in Melrose Park on or around July 5th 2011
